how to setup RedHat server with Subscription Manager

After system is installed, or before create a customer portal account at access.redhat.com

It will use a Username and Password with the account

Run the following from server

subscription-manager register –username=user –password=password –auto-attach subscription-manager status

Other useful commands

subscription-manager unregister subscription-manager clean subscription-manager repo –list –available –all

Check the customer portal and select subscriptions from the downloads list

Select evaluate - Red Hat Enterprise Linux
